steps.text: Lay out the tortillas on a clean surface.
Spread 1/4 cup of hummus on each tortilla, leaving a border around the edges.
Divide the chopped vegetables and spinach among the tortillas, placing them on top of the hummus.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Roll up the tortillas tightly, tucking in the sides as you go.
Slice the wraps into bite-sized pieces and serve. Enjoy your sugar-free veggie hummus wraps!

ingredients: 1 cup chopped mixed vegetables (such as bell peppers, cucumbers, carrots)
